sources.title: 1942 Der Hochtourist ( Joe Stöckel, Josef Eichheim, Trude Hesterberg)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1942. Der Hochtourist.  U.a mit Joe Stöckel und Josef Eichheim

metadata.Plot: On a solo vacation Franz enjoys wine and women though in his letters home he boasts with his alleged mountain climbing feats. When on a new trip his wife insists on witnessing his climbing skills he gets entangled in his own web o...
metadata.Writer: Curt Kraatz, Philipp Lothar Mayring, Max Neal
metadata.Actors: Joe Stöckel, Trude Hesterberg, Charlott Daudert
